column2: SELECT round (p.ra, #) as ra, round (p.dec, #) as dec, --- p.run, --- comments are preceded by --- --- round (p.extinction_r, #) as rExtSFD, --- r band extinction from SFD --- round (p.modelMag_u, #) as uRaw, --- ISM-uncorrected model mags --- round (p.modelMag_g, #) as gRaw, --- rounding up model magnitudes --- round (p.modelMag_r, #) as rRaw, --- round (p.modelMag_i, #) as iRaw, --- round (p.modelMag_z, #) as zRaw, --- round (p.modelMagErr_u, #) as uErr, --- errors are important! ---- round (p.modelMagErr_g, #) as gErr, --- round (p.modelMagErr_r, #) as rErr, --- round (p.modelMagErr_i, #) as iErr, --- round (p.modelMagErr_z, #) as zErr, --- round (p.psfMag_u, #) as uRawPSF, --- psf magnitudes --- round (p.psfMag_g, #) as gRawPSF, --- round (p.psfMag_r, #) as rRawPSF, --- round (p.psfMag_i, #) as iRawPSF, --- round (p.psfMag_z, #) as zRawPSF, --- round (p.psfMagErr_u, #) as upsfErr, --- round (p.psfMagErr_g, #) as gpsfErr, --- round (p.psfMagErr_r, #) as rpsfErr, --- round (p.psfMagErr_i, #) as ipsfErr, --- round (p.psfMagErr_z, #) as zpsfErr, --- p.type, --- tells if a source is resolved or not --- (case when (p.flags & #) = # then # else # end) as ISOLATED --- useful --- INTO mydb.SDSSimagingSample --- FROM PhotoTag p --- WHERE --- p.ra > # and p.ra < # and p.dec > # and p.dec < # --- ## sq.deg. --- and (p.type = # OR p.type = #) and --- resolved and unresolved sources --- (p.flags & #) = # and --- # is magic code for no --- DEBLENDED_AS_MOVING or SATURATED objects --- p.mode = # and --- PRIMARY objects only, which implies --- ! BRIGHT && (! BLENDED || NODEBLEND || nchild = = #) ] --- p.modelMag_r < # --- adopted faint limit (same as about SDSS limit) --- the end of query
